name: Sydsvenskan
description: Förbättrar utseende och gömmer reklam och betalväggar för http://www.sydsvenskan.se/
css: /*! Sydsvenskan.se Userstyle v0.1.12 | (C) 2013, 2014 vikekh | http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt */@-moz-document domain("sydsvenskan.se"){body{background:linear-gradient(27deg,#151515 5px,transparent 5px) 0 5px,linear-gradient(207deg,#151515 5px,transparent 5px) 10px 0,linear-gradient(27deg,#222 5px,transparent 5px) 0 10px,linear-gradient(207deg,#222 5px,transparent 5px) 10px 5px,linear-gradient(90deg,#1b1b1b 10px,transparent 10px),linear-gradient(#1d1d1d 25%,#1a1a1a 25%,#1a1a1a 50%,transparent 50%,transparent 75%,#242424 75%,#242424);background-color:#131313;background-size:20px 20px}div.b-centeredwrapper{width:1056px}div.b-page{height:auto!important}div.b-ad,div.b-site-header-market,div[id$=Popup]{display:none!important}div.b-blogs_item_first_preamble,div.b-yellowTeaser_container *,h1,h1 *,h2,h2 *,h3,h3 *,h4,h4 *,h5,h5 *,h6,h6 *,h7,h7 *{font-family:"Guardian Sans Web",Arial,sans-serif!important}div.b-blogs_item_preamble,p,p *{font-family:Arial,sans-serif!important}div.b-yellowTeaser_content{background-color:#f0f0f0}a.b-site-logo{position:relative}a.b-site-logo:after{content:"v0.1.12";background-color:#dc1e46;color:#fff;font:700 13px Arial,sans-serif;padding:2px 4px;border-radius:2px;position:absolute;bottom:0;left:470px}a.b-site-logo:hover:after{content:"bit.ly/1ddvffP\Av0.1.12";background-color:#fff;color:#000}}
